Set.Text: Increases the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a city. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from all sources of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City. Forests can be worked for +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Only the French may build it.

The Dolmen is the French unique replacement for the Stone Works. In addition to yielding [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and improving the yield of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble, [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone, and Forests, the Dolmen also yields [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and can be built in any City. The Dolmen has no technology prerequisite, so it can be built right away.
